text: "You Shouldn't Kiss Me Like This" is a 2000 song by Toby Keith and is the fourth and final single from his fifth studio album How Do You Like Me Now?!. It went to number 32 in the United States and topped the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart. ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Toby Keith songs
title: You Shouldn't Kiss Me Like This
